property.name: image similarity
property.description: Indicator how similar source and result are.

metric.name: equal
metric.description: Simple comparison of two values (A, B) of any type on equality.

metric.name: relative MAE
metric.description: Mean absolute error (average channel error distance)

metric.name: relative MSE
metric.description: Mean squared error (averaged squared error distance) as ratio of the bitdepth.

metric.name: simple SSIM
metric.description: Structural similarity Index using a gaussian window of 11x11 and a simple downscaled image to approximately 1024 px width/height. The calculation is performed on the brigthness channel of the HSB converted image.

metric.name: simple SSIM of saturation
metric.description: Structural similarity Index using a gaussian window of 11x11 and a simple downscaled image to approximately 1024 px width/height. The calculation is performed on the saturation channel of the HSB converted image.

metric.name: simple SSIM of hue
metric.description: Modified Structural similarity Index using a gaussian window of 11x11 and a simple downscaled image to approximately 1024 px width/height. The calculation is performed on the saturation channel of the HSB converted image. The calculation of the "luminance comparison" is modified in order to fit the cyclic scale of the hue.
